summary: The bill, titled the Protecting Life on College Campus Act of 2025, aims to prohibit federal funding to institutions of higher education that host or are affiliated with student-based service sites providing abortion drugs or abortions. It mandates annual reporting by these institutions to certify compliance and includes definitions for "abortion drug," "institution of higher education," and "school-based service site." The bill preempts states from penalizing institutions solely for complying with this act.
